mapper.select:
select distinct ci.comloaninfo_id,cp.com_name,bi.bankinfo_name,ci.contract_id, e.emp_name,lt.loantype_name,ci.loan_number,ci.loan_account, ci.loan_date,ci.loan_repayment_date,ci.loan_rate,
lg.lmr_name from comloaninfo ci,company cp,bankinfo bi, employee e,loantype lt,
loanmanagerecord lg where ci.com_id=cp.com_id and ci.bankinfo_id=bi.bankinfo_id and ci.emp_id=e.emp_id and ci.loan_type=lt.loantype_id
and lg.loaninfo_id=ci.comloaninfo_id and ci.loaninfo_type=1

select e.emp_id, cp.com_id,cp.com_name borName,bk.bankinfo_id,bk.bankinfo_name,e.emp_id,e.emp_name from comloaninfo ci,company cp,bankinfo bk,employee e where ci.com_id=cp.com_id and ci.emp_id=e.emp_id and loaninfo_type=1 and comloaninfo_id=#{comloaninfoId}
select contract_id from comloaninfo where contract_id=#{contractId}

select cli.loaninfo_type,cli.comloaninfo_id,cli.contract_id,cli.loan_type,cli.loan_number,cli.loan_account,to_char(cli.loan_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') LOAN_DATE,to_char(cli.loan_repayment_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') LOAN_REPAYMENT_DATE,cli.loan_rate,(cli.loan_number-cli.unrepay_number)unrepay_number,bi.*,cp.*,ee.*,lt.*,ls.*,lm.* from comloaninfo cli,bankinfo bi,employee ee,loantype lt,loanstate ls,company cp,loanmanage lm
cli.bankinfo_id = bi.bankinfo_id and cli.com_id = cp.com_id and cli.emp_id = ee.emp_id and cli.loan_type = lt.loantype_id and ls.loanstate_id = lm.loanstate_id and cli.comloaninfo_id = lm.loaninfo_id
and cp.com_name like '%' || '${comName}' ||'%'
and ee.emp_name like '%' || '${empName}' ||'%'
and cli.contract_id like '%' || '${contractId}' || '%'
and lm.loanstate_id = #{loanStateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cli.bankinfo_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cli.loan_repayment_date between to_date('${dateFrom}','yyyy/MM/dd')
and cli.loan_repayment_date between to_date('1900-01-01','yyyy/MM/dd')
and to_date('${dateTo}','yyyy/MM/dd')
and to_date('2100-12-31','yyyy/MM/dd')
mapper.update: update loanmanage set loanstate_id = #{loanState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where loaninfo_id = #{comloaninfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
